
# Misc Utilites
## LEDs
See my [Led Controller App](https://github.com/pierceTee/TrimuiLEDController) for an in-depth look at how the LEDs operate.

In short, the TrimUI devs made an LED API that their firmware (mostly) respects.

All LED logic is derived from the help file found in `/sys/class/led_anim/`

```sh
[TRIMUI LED Animation driver]
   max_scale : maximum LED brightness in dec [0 ~ tg5040 limit brightness 60]
   frame     : raw frames for total 23 XRGB 32bpp data
   frame_hex : frames for total 23 XRGB 32bpp data in hex format "RRGGBB RRGGBB RRGGBB ... RRGGBB " end with space.

[usage of anim to function]
   effect_lr: Left and right joystick LEDS effect type.
   effect_l: Left joystick LEDS effect type.
   effect_r: Right joystick LEDS effect type.
   effect_m : middle LED effect type.
  (effect_x for a trigger of effect start)
   effect_names : show the effect types description.
   effect_duration_lr: Left and right joystick LEDS animation durations.
   effect_duration_l: Left joystick LEDS animation durations.
   effect_duration_r: Right joystick LEDS animation durations.
   effect_duration_m : middle LED effect duration.
   effect_rgb_hex_lr: Left and right LED all target color in format "RRGGBB " end with space.
   effect_rgb_hex_l: Left LED all target color in format "RRGGBB " end with space.
   effect_rgb_hex_r: Right LED all target color in format "RRGGBB " end with space.
   effect_rgb_hex_m: Middle LED target color in format "RRGGBB " end with space.
   effect_cycles_lr: Left and right joystick LEDS animation loops.
   effect_cycles_l: Left joystick LEDS animation loops.
   effect_cycles_r: Right joystick LEDS animation loops.
   effect_cycles_m : middle LED effect loops.
  (cycles value: 0 for stop, -1 for endless loop, > 0 for loop times)
   effect_enable   : toggle of anim to function

[usage of framebuffer animation function !!Did not finish yet!!]
   anim_frames:       raw frames for total XRGB 32bpp data, buffer length 10 sec@60fps, 23 data per frame.
   anim_frames_hex:   same as anim_frames and use hex format "RRGGBB RRGGBB RRGGBB ... RRGGBB " end with space.
   anim_frames_cycle: animation loops count
   anim_frames_enable : toggle of frames anim function
   anim_frames_override_m_enable: toggle of middle LED in frames anim function.
```

Simple usage of the API can be found in my [turn off leds script](https://github.com/pierceTee/TrimuiLEDController/blob/master/workspace/scripts/runtime/turn_off_all_leds.sh) and [turn on leds script](https://github.com/pierceTee/TrimuiLEDController/blob/master/workspace/scripts/runtime/turn_on_all_leds.sh). A little more complex usage can be seen in my [led settings daemon](https://github.com/pierceTee/TrimuiLEDController/blob/master/workspace/service/settings-daemon.sh) that reads user settings from a .ini file and uses the API to set the LEDs.

For an even more complex example of API usage, check out [ro8inmorgans code](https://github.com/ro8inmorgan/LedControl/compare/v2.0...v2.1) that uses a runtime daemon to set the experimental framebuffer to get some cool animations from the top LED.

For a shell script example, check out the way TrimUI make the LEDs blink in their 
FnKey application 

####  Excerpt from `usr/trimui/apps/fn_editor/com.trimui.switch.cpufreq.sh`


```sh
=
led_reset() {
    echo 0 > /sys/class/led_anim/anim_frames_enable
    echo 1 > /sys/class/led_anim/anim_frames_mask_f1f2_enable
    echo 0 > /sys/class/led_anim/anim_frames_mask_lr_enable 
    echo 0 > /sys/class/led_anim/anim_frames_mask_m_enable 

    echo 1 > /sys/class/led_anim/anim_frames_cycles 
}

led_run() {
    echo 0 > /sys/class/led_anim/effect_enable
    echo 1 > /sys/class/led_anim/anim_frames_enable 
}




led_blink0() {
    #blue LED, less then 4096 per echo
    led_reset
echo "\
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 \

led_blink2() {
    #orange LED, less then 4096 per echo
    led_reset
echo "\
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 \
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 111100 000000 000000 000000 000000 \
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 222200 000000 000000 000000 000000 \

    #orange LED, less then 4096 per echo
    led_reset
echo "\
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 \
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 111000 000000 000000 000000 000000 \
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 221800 000000 000000 000000 000000 \
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 332000 000000 000000 000000 000000 \
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 442800 000000 000000 000000 000000 \
000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 000000 553000 000000 000000 000000 000000 \

led_blink4() {
    #orange LED, less then 4096 per echo
    led_reset
```
